thread.title: Filming begins in Dubai for new movie 'Star Trek Beyond'
thread.title_full: Filming begins in Dubai for new movie 'Star Trek Beyond'

title: Filming begins in Dubai for new movie 'Star Trek Beyond'
text: > Entertainment Filming begins in Dubai for new movie 'Star Trek Beyond' FILE - In this Feb. 22, 2015 file photo, Chris Pine arrives at the Oscars at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles. Looking for a “vertical city” to stand in for a futuristic world, actors and filmmakers involved in “Star Trek Beyond” found it among the gleaming towers of Dubai. Pine, who plays Capt. James T. Kirk in the rebooted films, described opening up the blinds of his hotel room to look out on “such a stunning city.” (Photo by Jordan Strauss/Invision/AP, File)
